GrindTo.GoalText: Looking for my book. Hmm, where did I put it?

CustomBehavior.Text: Do not interfere, I'm waiting for an NPC to pass by (Quest = Arelion's Secret).
Note that CombatUseItemOn seems to be bugged.

CustomBehavior.Lua: i=GetQuestLogIndexByID(9375) a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,j=GetQuestLogTitle(i) if g==-1 then SelectQuestLogEntry(i) SetAbandonQuest(i) AbandonQuest(i) end
